game.name: Gord
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Gord is a single-player adventure strategy. To survive, you must build, but to prevail, you must conquer the darkness beyond the gates. In this dark fantasy world, you must complete quests while managing a populace whose personal stories and well-being decide the fate of your tribe.

reviewHighlights.text: Abandoned game by developers, DO NOT BUY even on sale. Don't give them money for this, is not worth it.
This game tryes to be a city builder and an RTS and fails at both spectacularly!
